title: [Large-Scale] Job-Based English Speaking Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Maintaining intermediate or higher English reading/writing proficiency, understanding basic job-related English terminology
context.additional_context: A course focused on cultivating impromptu English conversation skills required in professional settings for medical, legal, and technical professionals, optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can communicate in English for over 5 consecutive minutes in three job scenarios (patient consultation/legal negotiation/technical explanation)
Learners can revise role-play dialogues by incorporating peer feedback with over 80% accuracy
Learners can achieve fluency scores of over 70% in project presentations reflecting real-world work situations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
